author: Adela Suliman
title: Coronavirus could spark first recession in 25 years in sub-Saharan Africa, World Bank warns
description: Coronavirus could spark first recession in 25 years in sub-Saharan Africa, World Bank warns
content:
Economic growth in sub-Saharan Africa is forecast to fall sharply as a result of the coronavirus outbreak, with a risk of sparking the first recession in the region in 25 years, the World Bank warned on Thursday.
The COVID-19 pandemic is testing the limits o… [+6255 chars]
